short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds various improvements to the Summit Learning platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BetterSLP is a browser extension that extends the Summit Learning platform with additional productivity and quality-of-life features such as:

• Focus area note taker
• GPA estimation
• Year progress report
• Dark mode (coming soon!)
• ... and more!

* * *

➤ Open source
Feel free to contribute: https://github.com/GavHern/better-slp

➤ Privacy statement
No tracking, advertising, or data collection of any kind!

➤ Issues and ideas
Bugs and suggestions can either be reported on the issues panel of the aforementioned GitHub repository or emailed to (betterslp@gavhern.com)

➤ Contact
For any further inquiries, please send us an email at (betterslp@gavhern.com)

* * *

Thank you to our contributors for making this project possible:
https://github.com/GavHern/better-slp/graphs/contributors

BetterSLP is not affiliated with summitlearning.org or Gradient Learning in any way. Features are not accessible on content assessments or math units.
